name: 雷蒙德·克鲁斯 Raymond Cruz
movies: 哭泣女人的诅咒 The Curse of La Llorona
area: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶
intro: Raymond Cruz is an American actor, best known for his starring role as Detective Julio Sanchez in the series The Closer and its spinoff Major Crimes, as well as his recurring role as the drug lord Tuco Salamanca in the crime drama Breaking Bad and its spin-off Better Call Saul.
